title: 1.15.2纯净原版服，需要一个可以回城的功能
author: 永恒~轮回
txt_content:
如题，无插件原版服务器。
很急！求大佬出手相救

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
/scoreboard objectives add trigger trigger

然后高频
/scoreboard players enable @a trigger 
/execute as @a if score @s trigger 1 run tp @s x y z
/execute as @a if score @s trigger 1 run tp @s x y z
/execute as @a if score @s trigger 1 run scoreboard players reset @s trigger

玩家输入 /trigger trigger set 1 即可回城

replies.author: 永恒~轮回
replies.txt_content:
もぺもぺ 发表于 2020-4-30 18:31
/scoreboard objectives add trigger trigger

然后高频
呃呃呃，你确定的你指令中间没少点什么嘛

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
永恒~轮回 发表于 2020-4-30 18:51
呃呃呃，你确定的你指令中间没少点什么嘛
描述你遇到的问题。

replies.author: 永恒~轮回
replies.txt_content:
もぺもぺ 发表于 2020-4-30 18:51
描述你遇到的问题。
当我进行这个/execute as @a if score @s trigger 1 run tp @s x y z步骤时，它提示我错误的命令参数 at position 35: ...s trigger

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
永恒~轮回 发表于 2020-4-30 18:54
当我进行这个/execute as @a if score @s trigger 1 run tp @s x y z步骤时，它提示我错误的命令参数 at  ...
/execute as @a if score @s trigger matches 1 run tp @s x y z
